oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1953-11-08 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1953-11-08, part 1. Personnel include Buddy Hall (host, performer), David Cobb (announcer), Owen Bradley (conductor) and the Lion Orchestra (performer), Dolores Watson (performer), the Anita Kerr Singers (performer), and Lige (Jim Sanders) & Beartrack (performers).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Hall; Anita Kerr Singers; Owen Bradley; Lion Orchestra; Dolores Watson; David Cobb; Lige & Beartrack
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Got The South In My Soul) (Buddy Hall) -- Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Opening statement (Buddy Hall) -- Hey, Mr. Cotton Picker (Buddy Hall, Anita Kerr Singers) -- Buddy Hall talks -- The Memphis Blues (Dolores Watson) -- Buddy Hall introduces the Anita Kerr Singers -- Tennessee Wig Walk (Anita Kerr Singers, David Cobb) -- Lion Oil commercial (David Cobb, Buddy Hall) -- Lion Oil jingle -- Buddy Hall talks -- Memphis In June (Buddy Hall) -- Buddy Hall and David Cobb introduce Lige & Beartrack -- Comedy routine (Lige & Beartrack)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Cobb, David (Announcer); Hall, Buddy (Singer); Anita Kerr Singers; Watson, Dolores; Bradley, Owen; Lion Orchestra (Musical group); Sanders, Jim (Comedian)
